description: Defines a Data Transfer Object (DTO) class for partially updating product details, with validation annotations and optional fields.

classes.name: ProductPatchRequest
classes.description: A DTO class for partial updates of product data, with optional fields for name, price, and quantity, including validation annotations.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the product name if set.

methods.name: getPrice
methods.description: Returns the product price if set.

methods.name: getQuantity
methods.description: Returns the product quantity if set.

methods.name: hasName
methods.description: Checks if the name field has been set.

methods.name: hasPrice
methods.description: Checks if the price field has been set.

methods.name: hasQuantity
methods.description: Checks if the quantity field has been set.
